    public interface ContractEmbosserWriter

    Extends embosser writer with an internal contract.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open​(boolean duplex,
          InternalContract contract)
   throws IOException,
          InternalContractNotSupportedException
        Opens for writing using the specified contract.
        Parameters:
        duplex - if both sides of sheets should be used, false otherwise
        contract - the contract
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O exception of some sort has occurred
        InternalContractNotSupportedException - if the supplied contract is not supported, that is to say if the contract does not contain information required by the implementation
